name: Can you Make It Out Alive Remastered
name_original: Can you Make It Out Alive Remastered
description:
This was originally a game to test some ideas for a game I was making but now I am working on turning it into a proper game. This is merely the Remastered edition of the Original. It's short with 3 difficulty settings.

The 'Sequel' will feature many more scenario filled with story elements.
